lines.text:
[presenting another gangster with a bomb tied to an alarm clock]
The bomb's ready, boss.
Swell. Set it for midnight.
Okay, boss.
[he does]
Gee, what a Valentine for Scarbush... the rat.
Yeah, it'll be a swell blowout.
[laughs]
Did you send for the messenger, boss?
Certainly. The dope's on his way now.
Gee, suppose it goes off too soon, boss?

[laughs]
Then we get a new messenger boy, see?
[both laugh]

[on Donald's bike radio as he goes to deliver the package]
Are you still alive?
Who, me?
If so, consider yourself lucky. But beware until midnight; it is still Friday the 13th.
Friday the 13th.
[suddenly shocked]
Friday the 13th?
"1313 13th Street". Oh, that's a bad sign.
Don't break a mirror. Don't let a black cat cross your path. Don't go under any ladder.
Boy, I'll say I won't.
